import axios from"axios";var serviceEvent=axios.create({baseURL:"https://collective-app-2.herokuapp.com/api/"// withCredentials: true // => you might need this option if using cookies and sessions
});var errorHandler=function errorHandler(err){throw err;};var uploadImage=function uploadImage(file){return serviceEvent.post("event/upload",file).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);};export default{serviceEvent:serviceEvent,uploadImage:uploadImage};
